sentence: Longtime Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan of northeastern Ohio is the front-runner in a small field of contenders that also includes progressive Morgan Harper, a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and 2020 congressional candidate, Whoever wins the GOP primary will likely be considered the favorite in November’s general election in Ohio, a one-time premiere battleground state that Trump won by eight points in both his 2016 presidential election and his 2020 reelection defeat.

title: Trump helps narrow field in crowded Ohio Republican Senate primary
